About Now Projects Writing

Therapist, Artist, Contemplative

I offer therapy through conversation, art, and mindfulness practice— helping people navigate life transitions, grief, and self-discovery. Book a session →

My work as a visual and performance artist lives at the intersection of contemplation, creativity, and care.

Interested in collaborating? Read about my creative approach →

In my downtime, I create videos for Little Nerdy Solutions — where I find fixes to oddly specific problems that I have accounted, that the world of the internet has yet to solve.
